title: Joan Cusack to Star as Chef Julia Child In HBO Drama Pilot
text:
Photo: Frederick M. Brown/Getty Images

Meryl Streep might have given us what felt like the ultimate study in being Julia Child in 2009’s Julie & Julia, but if everything goes our way, Joan Cusack will soon be strapping on an apron and flexing her own butter and flour-coated acting chops as the late, great celebrity chef and author. According to Variety, a scripted drama series based on Julia Child’s life is “nearing a pilot order” at HBO Max. The script, written by The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel producer and Tyrant writer Daniel Goldfarb, will probably have a lot less Amy Adams playing an easily-frustrated blogger compared to Meryl’s big-screen version, but honestly, isn’t that what we all wanted the whole time anyway?
description: HBO Max is reportedly nearing a pilot order for a scripted series about the life of esteemed chef and author Julia Child starring Joan Cusack.
